name: Wii U Homebrew Bundle
summary: A WUHB file is a Wii U Homebrew Bundle. It is an archive that contains an .RPX application, as well as associated assets and metadata . WUHB files can be loaded on a Wii U with the Aroma environment installed.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Place on Wii U SD card and open on a Wii U with the Aroma homebrew environment installed
